name: Daniel Buren
biography:
Born in Boulogne-Billancourt, France on 25  March 1938.
Education: Ecole Nationale Supérieuire des Metiers d'Art, Paris  graduated in 1960.
Independent artist.  Member of Buren, Mosset, Parmentier (Michael) and Toroni association, 1967.
Environmental artist interested in installation of his stripes on public buildings in order to provoke a new perspective for them.
